Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Interface CompositeOperator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Operator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoopHeadAlternative, LoopSubplan, OperatorAlternative, Subplan
    public interface CompositeOperator
extends Operator
    A composite operator can be decomposed into smaller operators.
